boat.dynamic_ol package

Submodules

boat.dynamic_ol.di_gda_ngd module

class boat.dynamic_ol.di_gda_ngd.DI_GDA_NGD(ll_objective: Callable, lower_loop: int, ul_model: Module, ul_objective: Callable, ll_model: Module, solver_config: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: DynamicalSystem

Implements the lower-level optimization procedure of the Naive Gradient Descent (NGD) [1], Gradient Descent Aggregation (GDA) [2] and Dynamic Initialization (DI) [3].

:param : :type : param ll_objective: The lower-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_objective: callable :param : :type : param ul_objective: The upper-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_objective: callable :param : :type : param ll_model: The lower-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ul_model: The upper-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param lower_loop: Number of iterations for lower-level optimization. :param : :type : type lower_loop: int :param : :type : param solver_config: Dictionary containing solver configurations. :param : :type : type solver_config: dict

References

[1] L. Franceschi, P. Frasconi, S. Salzo, R. Grazzi, and M. Pontil, “Bilevel

programming for hyperparameter optimization and meta-learning”, in ICML, 2018.

[2] R. Liu, P. Mu, X. Yuan, S. Zeng, and J. Zhang, “A generic first-order algorithmic

framework for bi-level programming beyond lower-level singleton”, in ICML, 2020.

[3] R. Liu, Y. Liu, S. Zeng, and J. Zhang, “Towards Gradient-based Bilevel

Optimization with Non-convex Followers and Beyond”, in NeurIPS, 2021.

optimize(ll_feed_dict: Dict, ul_feed_dict: Dict, auxiliary_model: _MonkeyPatchBase, auxiliary_opt: DifferentiableOptimizer, current_iter: int)[source]

Execute the lower-level optimization procedure with the data from feed_dict and patched models.

Parameters:

  • ll_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the lower-level data used for optimization. It typically includes training data, targets, and other information required to compute the LL objective.

  • ul_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the upper-level data used for optimization. It typically includes validation data, targets, and other information required to compute the UL objective.

  • auxiliary_model (_MonkeyPatchBase) – A patched lower model wrapped by the higher library. It serves as the lower-level model for optimization.

  • auxiliary_opt (DifferentiableOptimizer) – A patched optimizer for the lower-level model, wrapped by the higher library. This optimizer allows for differentiable optimization.

  • current_iter (int) – The current iteration number of the optimization process.

Returns:

None

boat.dynamic_ol.dm_gda_ngd module

class boat.dynamic_ol.dm_gda_ngd.DM_GDA_NGD(ll_objective: Callable, lower_loop: int, ul_model: Module, ul_objective: Callable, ll_model: Module, solver_config: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: DynamicalSystem

Implements the lower-level optimization procedure of the Naive Gradient Descent (NGD) [1], Gradient Descent Aggregation (GDA) [2] and Dual Multiplier (DM) [3].

:param : :type : param ll_objective: The lower-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_objective: callable :param : :type : param ul_objective: The upper-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_objective: callable :param : :type : param ll_model: The lower-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ul_model: The upper-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param lower_loop: Number of iterations for lower-level optimization. :param : :type : type lower_loop: int :param : :type : param solver_config: Dictionary containing solver configurations. :param : :type : type solver_config: dict

References

[1] L. Franceschi, P. Frasconi, S. Salzo, R. Grazzi, and M. Pontil, “Bilevel

programming for hyperparameter optimization and meta-learning”, in ICML, 2018.

[2] R. Liu, P. Mu, X. Yuan, S. Zeng, and J. Zhang, “A generic first-order algorithmic

framework for bi-level programming beyond lower-level singleton”, in ICML, 2020.

[3] Liu R, Liu Y, Yao W, et al. Averaged method of multipliers for bi-level optimization without lower-level strong convexity [C]. In ICML, 2023.

optimize(ll_feed_dict: Dict, ul_feed_dict: Dict, auxiliary_model: _MonkeyPatchBase, auxiliary_opt: DifferentiableOptimizer, current_iter: int)[source]

Execute the lower-level optimization procedure with the data from feed_dict and patched models.

  • ll_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the lower-level data used for optimization. It typically includes training data, targets, and other information required to compute the LL objective.

  • ul_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the upper-level data used for optimization. It typically includes validation data, targets, and other information required to compute the UL objective.

  • auxiliary_model (_MonkeyPatchBase) – A patched lower model wrapped by the higher library. It serves as the lower-level model for optimization.

  • auxiliary_opt (DifferentiableOptimizer) – A patched optimizer for the lower-level model, wrapped by the higher library. This optimizer allows for differentiable optimization.

  • current_iter (int) – The current iteration number of the optimization process.
